participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and social, always looking for fun adventures with friends.
participant_1.background: I'm learning a lot about myself and what I want to do with my life through my martial arts training. I love 80s music. I enjoy going to the movies with my friends because we can relax and have fun together. I listen to Bruno Mars in my room to feel close to someone. I remember spending hours in my room reading books while my dad worked.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys helping others and creating delicious meals.
participant_2.background: I enjoy comfort foods like macaroni and cheese, mashed potatoes, and chicken pot pie. I volunteer in my son’s boy scout troop. I live close to the coast. My number is 42. I’m the general manager of the local grocery store.

content.text: Hey there! What's your favorite 80s song?
ooo that's tough! I'd have to say either "Girls Just Want to Have Fun" or "Thriller"
Yes! Those are two of my favorites too! I love dancing to Girls Just Wanna Have Fun
Same here! I love dancing to both of them! What's your favorite thing to do on a Friday night?
I like to go to the movies with my friends! We love going and seeing new releases
That sounds like so much fun! I wish I had more friends to do that with
Oh no! You should try to make some friends! It's so much fun to have people to do things with
I know, I know! I'm trying but it's hard
I'm sure you'll find some friends! Just keep being yourself and you'll attract the right people
Thanks for the advice! I really appreciate it
No problem! I'm always here to chat if you need someone to talk to
Thanks! I'm glad to have met you
